relevant_rule: Rule 22 of the Federal Court Immigration and Refugee Protection Division Rules
evidence_presented: long delay by the Immigration and Refugee Board
lack of evidence of scandalous or outrageous behavior
decision_reasoning: delay not directly attributable to the Minister
motion for costs lacked evidence of reprehensible conduct
conclusion_outcome: dismissed as moot in all other respects
result_of_case: Applicants received ordinary costs; no solicitor-and-client costs were awarded
